reviewText: I recommend this video for anyone who is thinking of divorce, and as a divorce attorney I offer it to my clients at our initial consultation. If you don't know what collaborative divorce is, this video gives a good overview. If you do know what it is, but think it couldn't work for you, this video might change your mind. People have an unrealistic view of what judges and courts can accomplish for them in a divorce; there are no "winners." This DVD presents another option. Collaborative divorce is not for everyone, but it can help a lot of people, and this video explains how.
